Class PlayerBullets

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Java2DPlayerBullets
    public abstract class PlayerBullets
extends Entity
    This class is used to control the player bullets created by the player ship and the sound.
    Author:
    Bavo Lesy
